spec.expr: action:deployment_start environment:$environment stack:$stack service:$service
action:deployment_complete environment:$environment stack:$stack service:$service

spec.description: Single-service drill-down with actions, errors, latency, and dependencies

spec.expr: sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__interval])) / (vector($__interval_ms) / 1000)

sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__interval])) / (vector($__interval_ms) / 1000)

sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
quantile(0.5, quantile_over_time(0.5, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
quantile(0.5, quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
quantile(0.5, quantile_over_time(0.99, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (action) (quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
quantile(0.5, quantile_over_time(0.5, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))
level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:in($action) environment:$environment error_source:* | stats by(error_source) count() as errors
level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:in($action) environment:$environment | stats by(_time:5m, error_type) count() as errors
level:ERROR stack:$stack service:$service action:in($action) environment:$environment | stats by(error_message) count() as count | sort by (count) desc | limit 20
quantile(0.5, quantile_over_time(0.95, request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__interval])) / (vector($__interval_ms) / 1000)

sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (action) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

spec.title: All Actions by Volume & Error Rate

spec.expr: sum(count_over_time(cache_hit{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action", is_write="false"}[$__rate_interval] == 1)) / sum(count_over_time(cache_hit{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action", is_write="false"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100
level:ERROR error_source:* stack:$stack service:$service action:in($action) environment:$environment | stats by(_time:5m, error_source) count() as errors
(action:deployment_start OR action:deployment_complete) stack:$stack service:$service environment:$environment | sort by (_time desc) | limit 50
avg(avg_over_time(db_query_count{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack="$stack", service="$service", action=~"$action"}[$__rate_interval]))

spec.title: Service Detail
